thread.title: CMA to investigate FT acquistion by Nikkei
thread.title_full: CMA to investigate FT acquistion by Nikkei

title: CMA to investigate FT acquistion by Nikkei
text:
Tip : Use comma (,) to separate multiple quotes. Learn more... 
Mon, Sep 14, 2015, 18:11 BST - UK Markets closed CMA to investigate FT acquistion by Nikkei By Alexander Bueso | Sharecast – 1 hour 3 minutes ago 16.00 +0.89 
LONDON (ShareCast) - (ShareCast News) - The Competition and Markets Authority is investigating the acquisition of the The Financial Times from Pearson (Xetra: 858266 - news ) by rival Nikkei. Britain's competition watchdog said it was considering whether "it is or may be the case that this transaction has resulted in the creation of a relevant merger and whether that has resulted, or may be expected to result, in a substantial lessening of competition within any market or markets in the United Kingdom for goods or services." On 23 July the Japanese media outfit announced it would buy the iconic financial publisher for £844m. 
In 2014 the division contributed £334m of sales and £24m of adjusted operating income to Pearson.
